title.rendered: Minimum Cut-Off Marks and Commencement of Application for Post-UTME Screening/Interview

content.rendered:
This is to inform the general public that the College will announce its minimum cutoff mark and commence online application for Post-UTME Screening/Interview for ND Nursing programme at Kasimu Kofar Bai School of Nursing, st. Paul on 1st September, 2021.

Only candidates that chose the College, have correct UTME Subjects Combination (Use of English, Biology, Chemistry and Physics) and obtained the minimum cutoff marks will be eligible for the screening/interview. 

Signed
Academic Secretary,
For: Provost
